lines.text: Oh I do hope so Harriet, I couldn't bear to be parted from you.
Are you afraid of love or merely of me?
Shall I make you fall in love with me, Serena?
You're insane going with a man like that!
Would she be sane staying with a man like you?
I am informed that you are my son's fiancé. Who are you and where did he make your acquaintance?
Your son will doubtless explain everything to you, mam. The situation is not of my making.
